title: [SDMP 0.10.4](http://sdmp.github.io/) Resource Schema
description: Schema for SDMP resource objects. All resources published within the SDMP must conform to this schema.

sdmp.description: Root property defining the SDMP container. For resource objects, this holds additional metadata about the resource.

updates.description: The resources which this resource overrides. All resources in this list must be published by the publisher of this current resource.

items.description: The [resource identifier](http://sdmp.github.io/docs/resource/#resource-identifier) of the resource being overridden. This is equivalent to the SHA-512 used to sign the resource, whose octets are [unpadded base64url](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4648#section-5) encoded.
